Collect 18 points with this purchase Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) Invigorate mind, body and soul, naturally. Our sustainably-sourced pure essential oils harness the power of plants to naturally improve physical and emotional wellbeing. This invigorating Tea Tree Oil helps to naturally refresh the mind and revive the body for a fresh start to the day. We've taken steps to reduece our impact on the planet at every stage in this product's journey. People tested. Tea Tree Oil blends well with Rosemary Oil. - Not Tested on Animals - 100% Vegan - Sustainability Commitment Suitable for Adults and children 7 years and above How to use For inhalation, vaporisation and bathing, dilute up to 5 drops of oil in water. For massage, blend up to 5 drops of essential oil into 10ml of Botanics Unfragranced Base Massage Oil. Hazards and Cautions For external use only. Never apply neat oils to the skin, always dilute in a carrier oil. Seek professional advice before using if you suffer from epilepsy, skin allergies, are pregnant or, are using homeopathic remedies. Asthmatics should not inhale essential oils. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Not to be used on children under 7 years of age.
